trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs prior to adding a new item to a collection, typically in data-binding scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew?displayProperty=fullName>事件发生在将新项添加到集合中，通常在数据绑定方案中之前。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The handler of this event can supply the new item to be added, overriding the standard action of the collection class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的处理程序可以提供要添加新项重写的集合类的标准操作。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs> parameter `e` to this new item.
trans-unit.target: 这通过设置实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs>参数`e`为这个新项。</xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically this item must be of a type expected by the recipient collection, or the collection will throw an exception of type <xref:System.InvalidCastException>.
trans-unit.target: 通常此项必须为收件人的集合，预期的类型或该集合将引发类型<xref:System.InvalidCastException>.</xref:System.InvalidCastException>的异常

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used in data-binding scenarios, within classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用在数据绑定方案，在类，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AddingNewEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建一个 AddingNewEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
